name: Helbreath
description: Helbreath is a 2D fantasy MMORPG that has features including massive scale battles, unique characters and monsters, customizable avatars, special equipment and more. Players choose between the starter stats of Warrior, Mage and Magician, and character advancement occurs through a mix of questing, PvP, and hunting, depending upon player preference. In Helbreath, completely open PvP battles take place between members of the two warring factions.
